name: start
objective: firts use of chrome
description: Use chrome for the first time on Tizen PC
pre_condition: Have a google account and have Google chrome started and the "Sign in" page displayed

steps.description: type an email adress in the "Email" field
type a password
click on "Sign in"
steps.expected: The main "applications" page appears a gnome-keyring window appears

steps.description: type the root password twice in the gnome-keyring window
click on "Continue" or press "Enter"
steps.expected: Chrome can be used now normally

author: elebideau

name: search-bar
objective: use chrome search bar
description: Check the good behaviour of the chrome search bar
pre_condition: have Google chrome started in foreground

steps.description: Type "wikipedia" in the search field
Press "Enter"
steps.expected: a google research page appears

steps.description: click on the first link of the list
steps.expected: The Wikipedia page is displayed

steps.description: Type "hello world" in the search bar and press "Enter"
steps.expected: a google research page appears

steps.description: Type "he" in the search bar and press "Tab" and press "Enter"
steps.expected: The same google research page appears because the search criterias have been correctly added to the search engine

author: elebideau

name: new-tab
objective: open a new tab in chrom
description: use the "new tab" feature
pre_condition: Have Chrome started

steps.description: In the tab bar, click on the button next to the tabs
steps.expected: a new tab is opened and the google applications page appears

steps.description: In the google applications page, click on "Gmail"
steps.expected: The "Gmail" page appears

steps.description: Click again on the "new tab" button
steps.expected: a new tab is opened and the google applications page appears

steps.description: In the google applications page, click on "Google Search"
steps.expected: The "Google Search" page appears

steps.description: Click again on the "new tab" button
steps.expected: a new tab is opened and the google applications page appears

steps.description: In the google applications page, click on "YouTube"
steps.expected: The "YouTube" page appears

steps.description: Click again on the "new tab" button
steps.expected: a new tab is opened and the google applications page appears

author: elebideau

name: reopen-closed-tab
objective: Verify that the "Reopen closed tab" feature works
description: When a tab is closed, it can be reopened by typing Ctrl+Shift+T or use the context menu in tab bar
pre_condition: open multiple tabs

steps.description: close a tab
right click on the tab bar and select item "Reopen Closed Tab"
steps.expected: the last closed tab is restored

steps.description: close tab again
type ctrl+shift+T
steps.expected: the tab reopens

author: sdx

name: bookmark
objective: create a bookmark
description: check the creation of bookmarks
pre_condition: Have chrome started with a website displayed

steps.description: click on the star on the right of the search field
steps.expected: a bookmark window appears

steps.description: click on the "Folder" button
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: in the drop-down menu, click on "Bookmarks Bar"
click on "Done"
steps.expected: The displayed page appears as bookmark in the bookmarks bar under the search field

author: elebideau

name: rith-click-link
objective: Right click on a link to see available options
description: Check if the right-clicking on a link in chrome offers several options
pre_condition: have Google chrome started on Wikipedia page

steps.description: Right-Click on a link on the page
steps.expected: A drop down-menu opens

steps.description: In the drop down menu, look at the different options
steps.expected: Should appears "Open Link in New Tab", "Open Link in New Window", "Open Link in Incognito Window", "Save Link As...", "Copy link Address" and "Inspect Element"

author: elebideau

name: rith-click-image
objective: Right click on an image to see available options
description: Check if the right-clicking on an image in chrome offers several options
pre_condition: have Google chrome started on Wikipedia page

steps.description: Right-Click on an image on the page
steps.expected: A drop down-menu opens

steps.description: In the second section of the drop down menu, look at the different options
steps.expected: Should appears "Save Image As...", "Copy Image URL", "Copy Image", "Open Image in New Tab"

author: elebideau

name: task-manager
objective: Use the task manager
description: Check if the task manager allows to see the different tabs opened and to stop the processes corresponding
pre_condition: have Google chrome started in foreground with several pages opened

steps.description: Press Shift+Escape to open up the task manager
steps.expected: The Task Manager window appears with all the tab and plugins used listed with CPU, memory and network interface details

steps.description: Select a Task corresponding to a tab and click on "End Process"
steps.expected: The tab corresponding displays a "dead" page

author: elebideau

name: browser-history
objective: history in google chrome
description: Check the history in google chrome
pre_condition: have Google chrome started in foreground

steps.description: Press Ctrl+H
steps.expected: a new "History" tab opens and the navigation history is displayed with small thumbnail images next to each site visited

author: elebideau

name: save-html
objective: use google chrome to save a web site in HTML format
description: Check if Chrome allows to save any web site in HTML
pre_condition: have Google chrome started with any website displayed

steps.description: Press Ctrl+S
steps.expected: A file manager is displayed

steps.description: Select a directory and click on "Save"
steps.expected: The HTML document has been saved in the selected directory

author: elebideau

name: open-html
objective: use google chrome to open a HTML file
description: Check if Chrome can open saved HTML file
pre_condition: Have a HTML file in your home directory

steps.description: In your home directory, double-click on the HTML file
steps.expected: Chrome starts and correctly displays the HTML file as a web site

author: elebideau

name: download-file
objective: download a file on the system with google chrome
description: Check if Chrome allows to download a file on the system
pre_condition: have Google chrome started with any website displayed which links on a file

steps.description: Click on the file link
steps.expected: A bottom-bar appears with the file downloading in your configured/default directory

author: elebideau

name: drag-and-drop-chrome-app
objective: drag and drop something (text, url) from google chrome to an application
description: Check if selected things like text can be dragged and dropped into an other application
pre_condition: have Google chrome started with any website displayed and some bookmarks in the bookmarks bar displayed

steps.description: Select some text in the webiste
Hold the mouse on the selected text and drop it into an application typing field
steps.expected: The selected text has been dragged and dropped in an other application

steps.description: Hold the mouse on a bookmark/link in the bookmarks bar or anywhere else and drop it into an application field
steps.expected: The URL of the selected bookmark has been dragged and dropped into an other application

author: elebideau

name: drag-and-drop-app-chrome
objective: drag and drop something (text, url) from an application to google chrome
description: Check if selected things like text can be dragged and dropped into chrome
pre_condition: have Google chrome started any application that allows to select text started

steps.description: Select some text/bookmark/link/url in any application that allows to select text
Drag and drop what has been selected into the Chrome search bar
steps.expected: What has been selected is correctly dropped into the Chrome search bar

author: elebideau

name: copy-paste-chrome-app
objective: copy/paste from Google chrome to an application
description: Check if selected things like text/images can be copied/pasted into an other application
pre_condition: have Google chrome started with any website displayed and some bookmarks in the bookmarks bar displayed

steps.description: Right-click on a picture in a website
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Click on "Copy Image"
Switch to an application that allows to insert objects
Right-click in a blank field
steps.expected: A drop-down men opens

steps.description: Click on "Paste"
steps.expected: The Picture has been correctly inserted into the application

steps.description: Back into chrome, select some text in the website and copy it on the same way
Switch to the application and paste the text
steps.expected: The text has been correctly pasted

author: elebideau

name: copy-paste-app-chrome
objective: copy/paste from an applicaion to Google chrome
description: Check if selected things like text/images can be copied/pasted into Chrome
pre_condition: Have Chrome started with Gmail displayed and a new draft mail opened

steps.description: Right-click on a picture in an application
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Click on Copy
Switch to Chrome and right-click in the new draft mail opened in Gmail
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Select "Paste"
steps.expected: The picture has correctly been pasted into the new drat mail

steps.description: Back into the application, select some text that can be selected and copy it on the same way
Switch to Chrome and paste the text in the draft mail
steps.expected: The text has been correctly pasted

author: elebideau

name: hyperlink-shortcut
objective: hyperlink shortcut on desktop
description: Check if Chrome allows to create shortcut for URL on the desktop
pre_condition: have Google chrome started with any website displayed

steps.description: On the website displayed, choose a link and drag and drop it on the desktop
steps.expected: An icon "Link to ..." has been created on the desktop

author: elebideau

name: open-hyperlink
objective: open a hyperlink shortcut
description: Check if the hyperlink shortcut previously created is opened in Chrole
pre_condition: Have A shortcut to an hyperlink on your desktop

steps.description: Click on the shortcut
steps.expected: Chrome starts and displays correctly the website pointed by the hyperlink

author: elebideau

name: import-bookmark-browser
objective: Import bookmars in google chrome from other browser
description: Check if Chrome can import correctly bookmarks from other browser installed
pre_condition: Have Google chrome started

steps.description: Click on the Tools button
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Select "Bookmarks"
steps.expected: A drop-right menu opens

steps.description: Click on "Import Bookmark and Settings ..."
steps.expected: A new "Settings" tab opens with an "Importing window in foreground"

steps.description: On the Importing window, check what will be imported (Favorites/Bookmarks)
On the top-window, select from which browser bookmarks will be imported
Click on "Import"
steps.expected: Your Browser bookmarks have been correctly imported into Chrome and are available in Chrome bookmarks bar

author: elebideau

name: export-bookmark-to-file
objective: export bookmarks to a HTML file
description: Check if Chrome can export correctly bookmarks to HTML file
pre_condition: Have Google chrome started

steps.description: Click on the Tools button
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Select "Bookmarks"
steps.expected: A drop-right menu opens

steps.description: Click on "Bookmark Manager"
steps.expected: A new "Bookmark Manager" tab opens

steps.description: In the "Bookmark Manager" tab, click on "Organize"
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: In the drop-down menu, click on "Export Bookmarks to HTML File..."
steps.expected: A file manager window opens

steps.description: Select a directory and click on "Save"
steps.expected: A HTML file listing the Chrome bookmarks has correctly been created in the selected directory

author: elebideau

name: import-bookmark-from-file
objective: import bookmarks from a HTML file
description: Check if Chrome can import correctly bookmarks from a HTML file
pre_condition: Have Google chrome started

steps.description: Click on the Tools button
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: Select "Bookmarks"
steps.expected: A drop-right menu opens

steps.description: Click on "Bookmark Manager"
steps.expected: A new "Bookmark Manager" tab opens

steps.description: In the "Bookmark Manager" tab, click on "Organize"
steps.expected: A drop-down menu opens

steps.description: In the drop-down menu, click on "Import Bookmarks from HTML File..."
steps.expected: A file manager window opens

steps.description: Select the bookmark HTML file in the file manager
Click on "Open"
steps.expected: A directory "Imported" containing all bookmarks listed in the HTML file has been created in the Chrome bookmark manager and is available in the Bookmark bar

author: elebideau
